column16: Finding description method: Please select how you will classify findings throughout this report. Critical/Major/Minor OR Critical/Other. Once selected, please be consistent throughout the report.
column19: Please note that there are two distinct findings classification methods (Critical/Other or Critical/Major/Minor). Once you have selected a method here, please be consistent throughout the audit report. If in doubt, please contact the report owner (who is commissioning the audit) to confirm their preferred method.
